meanings.definition: A band or elastic used to hold hair in place.
meanings.sent1: I always use hairbands to keep my hair neat and tidy.
meanings.sent2: She wore colorful hairbands to match her outfits.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole my hairbands and used them to decorate its nest.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a collection of colorful hairbands, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The hairbands snapped as she tried to stretch them over her thick hair.

meanings.definition: A band worn around the head to keep hair off the face.
meanings.sent1: During sports practice, she always wore hairbands to keep her hair out of her eyes.
meanings.sent2: The fashion model styled her hair with a chic hairband for the photoshoot.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled a never-ending string of hairbands from his hat, surprising the audience.
meanings.sent4: The hairband of time kept her memories neatly in place, ready to be revisited.
meanings.sent5: The hairband hugged her head gently, keeping her hair in place without any discomfort.
